# UIActivity.ActivityType

**Structure**

A structure that describes the types of activities for which the system has built-in support.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ActivityType
```

## Overview

These constants represent the values that can be stored in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity/activityType-swift.property] property of system-defined activity objects.

## Constants

- **addToHomeScreen**
- **addToReadingList**: A type of activity that adds the URL to Safari’s reading list.
- **airDrop**: A type of activity that makes the provided content available through AirDrop.
- **assignToContact**: A type of activity that assigns the image to a contact.
- **collaborationCopyLink**
- **collaborationInviteWithLink**
- **copyToPasteboard**: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the pasteboard.
- **mail**: A type of activity that posts the provided content to a new email message.
- **markupAsPDF**: A type of activity that marks up the provided content as a PDF file.
- **message**: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the Messages app.
- **openInIBooks**: A type of activity that opens the content in iBooks.
- **postToFacebook**: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s wall on Facebook.
- **postToFlickr**: A type of activity that posts the provided image to the user’s Flickr account.
- **postToTencentWeibo**: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s Tencent Weibo feed.
- **postToTwitter**: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s Twitter feed.
- **postToVimeo**: A type of activity that posts the provided video to the user’s Vimeo account.
- **postToWeibo**: A type of activity that posts the provided content to the user’s Weibo feed.
- **print**: A type of activity that prints the provided content.
- **saveToCameraRoll**: A type of activity that assigns the image or video to the user’s camera roll.
- **sharePlay**: A type of activity that makes the provided content available through SharePlay.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates an activity type.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

## Getting the activity information

- **activityCategory**: The category of the activity, which may be used to group activities in the UI.
- **UIActivity.Category**: An enumeration that defines categories of activities.
- **activityType**: The type of service being provided.
- **activityTitle**: A user-readable string that describes the service.
- **activityImage**: An image that identifies the service to the user.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
